headline: Why Broadcom Stock Sank Today
summary: Broadcom stock sold off today as investors got some bad news about Stargate Project's $500 billion AI infrastructure build-out.  Stargate has reportedly gotten off to a significantly slower-than-expected start.  Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO) stock closed out Tuesday's trading in the red.

headline: S&P 500 Ekes Out Record–Even as Nvidia and Broadcom Close Lower
summary: The Nasdaq Composite snapped its six-day streak of record closing highs amid a wave of AI stock selling, but the S&P 500 carried the torch by building on yesterday’s milestone.  The tech-heavy index fell 0.4% to snap a streak of closing highs a week after it began, but the S&P 500 rose to a fresh closing high with a gain of 0.1%.  Smallcap stocks also posted strong gains in the rally.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Ekes Out Record–Even as Nvidia and Broadcom Close Lower

Smallcap stocks also posted strong gains in the rally.

headline: The S&P 500 Would Be Cruising to Another Record Today—If Not for These Stocks
summary: Because the S&P 500 weighs its members by market capitalization, it was being dragged down by some of its heaviest hitters.  The other biggest daily market cap drops were Amazon.com, Meta Platforms, and Phillip Morris International, all with market cap declines around $20 billion.  The Dow, which offers less tech exposure and measures members by stock price instead of market cap, was up nearly 100 points, or 0.2%.

headline: Chip stocks slide, NXP weak outlook, Coinbase inks PNC deal
summary: Chipmakers Nvidia (NVDA), Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and Broadcom (AVGO) are trading lower following reports from the Wall Street Journal that SoftBank and OpenAI's $500 billion artificial intelligence (AI) data center project is off to a slow start. NXP Semiconductors (NXPI) stock slips after the company reported a drop in second quarter revenue and profit and warned of continued softness in third quarter. Coinbase (COIN) announced a new partnership with PNC Bank (PNC) to offer crypto services through its crypto-as-a-service platform. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: The Redesign Group Named VMware’s FY25 Q2 North America Impact Partner of the Quarter for Corporate SLED and Commercial Sales Segments
summary: EL SEGUNDO, Calif., July 22, 2025--The Redesign Group ("Redesign"), a global technology and cybersecurity firm, today announced it has been named VMware's FY25 Q2 North America Impact Partner of the Quarter for Corporate SLED and Commercial Sales Segments.

headline: Tech stocks drag on Nasdaq as investors monitor corporate profits, US tariff talks
summary: (Reuters) -The Nasdaq was pressured by falling megacap stocks on Tuesday, a day before major tech results are due, while investors assessed a spate of second-quarter corporate earnings and watched for signs of progress in U.S. trade discussions.  At 11:25 a.m. ET, the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 53.78 points, or 0.11%, to 44,372.37, the S&P 500 lost 6.56 points, or 0.10%, to 6,298.48 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 100.59 points, or 0.48%, to 20,874.05.  General Motors saw its second-quarter profit skid 32% to $3 billion, with the automaker blaming hefty tariff costs for carving out $1.1 billion from its results.
